props.hideActions: Prevent showing the default actions buttons. Does not affect `<component :is="actions" />`
props.disabled: Control the disabled state of action buttons. If not provided, internal logic will be used to determine the disabled state.

events.ok: The event emitted when the user clicks the OK button
events.save: The event emitted when the user clicks the Save button
events.cancel: The event emitted when the user clicks the Cancel button
